header.description: Scan the Code Coverage report from a build life

step-type.name: Scan Code Coverage Report
step-type.description: Run a scan on the code coverage report from a build life in UC Build

property-ui.label: Project ID
property-ui.description: Project ID containing the build to scan

property-ui.label: Process ID
property-ui.description: Process ID containing the build to scany

property-ui.label: Build Life ID
property-ui.description: Build Life ID containing the code coverage report

property-ui.label: Percentage Type
property-ui.description: Which percentage type should be scanned

property-ui.label: Complexity Level
property-ui.description: Valid only when scanning by group. Scanner will only look at values lower or equal to this complexity

property-ui.label: Complexity Flag
property-ui.description: When complexity is set, should the coverage be analyzed if the complexity is higher or lower than the number specified

property-ui.label: Percentage
property-ui.description: Percentage - if percentage is lower than this value, the scanner will fail

property-ui.label: UC Build URL
property-ui.description: UC Build URL To use for REST Calls

property-ui.label: Password
property-ui.description: Password of UC Build user to use when connecting
